about_the_game:
Tired of being alone? Try this exciting two-player tower defense game! Together with your friends, you will build defensive towers and unleash magic in a fantasy world to ward off waves of incoming monster armies!

Featured gameplay:

Double cooperation, strategy upgrade: real-time communication with friends, division of labor cooperation, and jointly develop defense strategies. One person is responsible for building the defense tower, the other is focused on releasing magic, and the team will get more results with less!

Rich tower defense, free to match: a variety of different functions of the defense tower waiting for you to unlock, turret, magic tower, watchtower... According to the enemy type and terrain characteristics, free to match, build the strongest line of defense!

A variety of magic, the right time: The magic master has a variety of magic abilities, at the right time, the right position to release your magic to repel enemies or assist teammates!

Various levels, challenge escalation: from the quiet village to the red leaves everywhere, multiple theme levels waiting for you to challenge, each level has a unique route, test your strategy and adaptability!

Play side by side with your friends and experience double happiness! Join the game now and start your tower defense adventure!
